comment: While Stats is not most people's favorite kind of math, she made it bearable and almost enjoyable. You didn't have to extra work unless you wanted the practice.
There's plenty of materials to use to study. It would be hard to fail this class!

Love her! She's really great at breaking down and explaining each part of the material so you get it. Its definitely a fast paced class so be ready for that. I'd highly recommend going to class everyday because she works through every page of the notes. She lets you use a notecard on every quiz and test. Easiest math class you'll ever take!
TAKE HER!!

Dr. Galloway is up there with Tom Garr. She is hands down the best math educator I've ever had in my life. I went through high school/round 1 of college with F's and C's in every math class I ever took. Fast fwd 10 years to finish my undergrad and STAT is on my first semester...because of her, I aced with an A+. Phenomenal educator!

Honestly this class was pretty easy & I would take it again. She's patient with us and is willing to help students who are struggling. She breaks it down for the students and makes sure that everyone understands. She also let us use a notecard during the test she had.

Very straightforward stats class. Dr. Galloway is very accessible outside of class and explains concepts in a clear manner. The only thing you really have to do to get an A is do the ALEKS work and use the practice she posts. Lectures are recorded and she posts every available resource on D2L to help students.

I would recommend her to anyone. She is an amazing teacher and used to teach high school. She is so nice and would love to answer any questions. She looks intimidating but really, she is so sweet. Amazing teacher, amazing person!

Ms.Galloway made math so easy for me! I have never been good at math but the resources she lent her class were helpful. There would be quizzes every 2 weeks but they were short and answer. Tests were straightforward as well. Just study and do your notes. She gives guided notes. You are allowed to have a notecard on everything!

Professor Galloway makes stats easy to understand. She provides plenty of practice and resources to succeed. Attendance is recommended but not mandatory. I found unstuckstudy great for prep along with the textbook.

I have literally always struggled with math...even the basics. Prof Galloway explains the stat concepts in an easy to understand way. She made me stop thinking i suck at math!!! Take her if you are not the greatest at stats/math. She posts practice question for every test/quiz and they are pretty much the same. Study those you'll be perfect!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: She is a great math teacher that i will say in my life! This is one of the first times I actually liked math and learned how to do every unit on my own without stressing about if I know the concept or not. Her test are straight forward, and she has an amazing SI leader who helps with sessions as well! This is coming from a non math person!

Professor Galloway is AMAZING! I was not excited to take STAT but professor Galloway is truly such a good teacher. She is extremely organized and her D2L page has everything you will ever need. If you actually do the work and practice, you will ace the class. I ended with a high A and was even able to be exempt from the final! 10/10 Professor.

TAKE HER! She is the most amazing prof I've ever had. Dr. Galloway cares deeply for her students and wants the best for them. She makes content very clear and provides resources to help you succeed. Expectations are super clear and easy to follow from day 1. If you have to take this course, do what you have to do to take this professor!!!

Professor Galloway is my favorite by far! She teaches so well and is there for her students if we need help. She responds to emails fast. The weekly homework is very easy and she allows us to do it over until we get the grade we want. Some of the quizzes were online but most were in person and not hard unless you don't study or miss a class.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: This professor was amazing! She offers every available resource you need to succeed ranging from her time outside of class to study guides to index cards on tests. Notes and videos are available online. Not a lot of homework. Attendance is not required, but if she marks you absent less than three times, you get extra credit.

If you are taking elementary stat, she is a very good professor. She works through the problems with you and provides lots of practice work to help you. She also really wants all of her students to succeed in class

Professor Galloway is amazing. She explains everything in such an understandable way and has really helpful recorded lectures to go back to if you need a pick me up while studying/ doing homework. Offers guided notes that follow really well with the lectures. Attendance=Extra Credit but not mandatory. Study her notes not ALEKS, she writes all exams

My favorite professor at Kennesaw thus far. I have never been strong in math and was very nervous about taking stat but she made it a breeze. Gives ample amount of resources on d2l to use to study and tests are straightforward! Lectures are very informative and easy to follow.

I can't say enough positive things about Dr. Galloway. She was willing to work with you if you miss a test, help you in her own personal time, and answer any questions. She truly cares about her students and his willing to help anyone! Great teacher, providing completed notes and extra help on d2l.

Definitely one of the best math teachers I've ever had. I was nervous coming into the class, but this ended up being a fairly straightforward class. She explains things very well and thoroughly, highly recommend taking this class.

The best professor ever! The notes and homework are very helpful and are like the quizzes and tests. Some days before the test is designated for going over notes and reviewing. She also gives 20 minutes of class to study before a quiz! She will respond to emails and is very accessible outside of class. IF POSSIBLE TAKE HER!!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: No one has ever made math SO easy than Prof. Galloway! As long as you show up, take notes, and ask questions you'll pass with flying colors. I had an A for majority of the semester which has never happened in math for me before!

I loved Professor Galloway! She is very helpful if you have questions and takes the time to go over the harder topics. She takes the time to explain a concept and review it thoroughly before tests and quizzes. She even has review days before assessments that are focused on practicing what you have learned. I would 100% take her again.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Really enjoyed her class. Although her teaching/testing method may be slightly different than a lot of other stat professors, it worked much better for me and really promoted learning and understanding. Study what you did wrong on the quizzes because they're exactly like the tests. If you practice the problems, you'll do great.

This class really gives you everything you could ask for in a Statistics course. The lectures are very thoroughly explained, and you'll know exactly what the expectation is to succeed. There's so many resources that she has available through D2L. You will have to work to get an A, but as long as you use what's available to you, you'll do great!

Dr. Galloway is a straight-shooter. She is very direct and clear about how she grades and what is on the test. She allows a notecards worth of information on each quiz and test, mostly in class but some online. She is nice, caring, and allowed me to do my honors project with her. She is an amazing teacher and for anyone taking stat, PLEASE TAKE HER

Professor Galloway is very knowledgeable about statistics and makes everything easy to understand. She provides notes and practice that prepare you for quizzes and exams. Not much homework other than a few ALEKS assignments. Tests and quizzes are exactly like what is taught in class.

Galloway rocks. She is very good at what she does and really works with you to make sure you understand the material. Her tests are just like the worksheets she provides and she posts online lectures in case you miss class or need extra help. 100% recommend her and she is so sweet to all her students. You can tell she wants her students to succeed.

This class was very easy if you go to class, pay attention, and do the work. You use Aleks for homework, and there are 2 chapters in each unit and there are 4 units. If she has any bad ratings its because they didn't try.
There is not much to say about Dr. Galloway other than she is a truly well-rounded amazing professor. Take her for STAT1401.

Galloway was an excellent professor!! HIGHLY RECOMEND taking her class for an EASY A in stat. She gives out guided teaching notes and has a quiz for every chapter( super easy). It's an easy class if you go to class and listen to her.
Professor is super kind and sweet. She actually made me like and understand math. If you take her just make sure to pay attention because she covers lots of different things relatively quickly.

Dr. Galloway is amazing! she gives you guided notes for every lecture, I recommend you print them out. she posts her lectures online in case you miss class, she gives you an outline of what's basically going to be on it. She also lets you use both sides of an index card on any quizzes or tests. I passed with an easy A.

TAKE HER. Dr.Galloway was a really good lecturer and described everything really well. Attendance wasn't mandatory, but I really suggest you go to class. She posts videos of her notes in case you miss. She makes it clear what she wants from your assignments and she grades very fairly. Honestly, she's one of the best math teachers I've ever had.

TAKE HER!! I usually don't do well in math but have a 98 avg in her class. Practice the problems on the notes/extra worksheets because they are just like the tests/quizzes. She cares and wants you to be successful. Attendance isn't required but you'll do better if you go to class because she explains things so well. study what you don't know

Dr. Galloway cares so much for her students. She sometimes will refer to herself as a "Math Momma", which is very accurate. She wants all of her students to succeed. Her quizzes and tests are very easy if you pay attention in class and do the homework. She sometimes offers extra credit. I highly recommend!

She is a amazing teacher for Stat 1401, she cares about her students and wants them to succeed. Her tests are easy if you pay attention in class, or if you don't go to class, you can watch her lecture videos and go through her completed guided notes from the lecture you missed. I usually suck at math but this class was not hard.
TAKE DR GALLOWAY!! She's an amazing caring professor and makes sure you are prepared for every test! Do the homework and any extra practice she offers! She gives plenty of chances for a great grade!

Great professor! She creates her own notes so her lectures are easy to follow. Would recommend you print them out beforehand to fill in during class. HW online is easy and helps your grade in the end. Go to class!! you fall behind because she covers a lot every class. Very easy to contact and very good at her job! would love to take her again

Dr. Galloway is very caring and a great professor. There is three unit tests and quizzes every chapter. The tests were all in person and most of the quizzes were, but some were online or take home. ALEKS homework every chapter but you have a week for each assignment. Easy A if you show up and pay attention.

Dr.Galloway is one of the best teachers at KSU almost ended the term with an 82 but with her extra credit and extra studying I ended with an A. Please take her if you can! Print out notes to go along with and youll be fine!

Dr. Galloway was one of the best professors I've ever had. She genuinely cares about her students and their success. She also gives plenty of opportunities to raise your grade at the end of the semester. As someone who was scared t take this course because I'm bad at math, she made it easy and stress-free! If you have the chance to take her, DO IT!
Attendance is not mandatory but she will post videos for material you missed. You do have to study and practice the problems but it was pretty easy to make an A.

If you have a chance, take her. She gives many opportunities to help your grade even if you are failing till the very end and she is very willing to help with any questions you have.  She actually cares about grades and is understanding that other things happen in life.

Professor Galloway was one of the best professors I've had at KSU by far! She is so sweet and caring and genuienly wants you to pass her class. You have to put in the work but as long as you follow along with the amazing lectures she gives youll be set, also stay caught up on the homework and youll know exactly whats going on!

Dr. Galloway is incredible! She really cares about all of her students and wants all of them to succeed. The class was overall easy but I recommend going to class so you can learn everything in person. She is very good at explaining things and teaching how to do the problems. She's the best!

You absolutely won't regret taking Professor Galloway! She goes above and beyond to give you the resources you need to get an A in her class. She provides online videos of her lectures (so attendance is not mandatory) but it still help, she provides chapter outlines that tells exactly what will be on the tests and explains information really well.

Quizzes are lockdown browser. Tests are taken in class. She posts study guides for every quiz. The students who were failing were the ones who did not do the study guides or go to class. She wants all of her students to pass but you have to meet her halfway. She will not hand you an A, but she gives you the resources to make an A. AMAZING PROFESSOR

Dr. Galloway is a great choice! Her lessons are clear and it is very beneficial if you work the problems along with her. The problems on her notes and quizzes are exactly like the test questions so she isn't trying to trick you. She also lets you have a notecard. As long as you show up to class or really pay attention you'll do great!!

As long as you study and keep up with the homework and quizzes you will pass. Most of the quizzes are online but it's a lockdown browser and webcam. All the test are in-person but you are allowed to have a notecard with formulas. There is a lot of homework through ALEKs but it's manageable.

Simply a great professor. Her course was very well organized and her lectures were short, sweet, and to the point. Plenty of time spent in class practicing problems. I have never taken a course where the professor prepares you for the test as much as she did, and she doesn't put trick questions in her tests either. She made 6 weeks of math easy.

She is honestly one of the best professors I have ever had. Math has never been my strong suit but she makes it really easy to understand. I ended this class with a 100. If you can have her as a professor take this class!

i would hands down take this professor again! she is one of the best professors i've had so far. there is homework on ALEKS but it definitely help with the tests and quizzes. I thought statistics was going to be hard but she made it easy and i learned a lot from this course. she gives you the option to take the test in person or online.

Dr. Galloway is amazing. I didn't think I would understand statistics but she teaches the material so clearly, I felt comfortable going into every test. She is very caring and wants her students to succeed. Other teachers need to learn a thing or two from her.

Dr. Galloway is an AMAZING professor. She is sweet, to the point, and genuinely wants you to have the best opportunity to succeed. You won't pass her class by simply doing the homework, but she does teach in a way that if you simply listen and practice doing the problems alongside her, you're good to go. 10/10 instructor and person in general.

Once classes transitioned online due to COVID, I began to fall in line after moving back home and getting sick. Dr. Galloway made herself available to me, gave thorough notes, and just knew her stuff. After taking her course, I now have taken on a statistics minor because I really enjoyed the class and have an appreciation for statistical studies.

Dr. Galloway is literally my favorite prof ever. I'm a nursing major who hates math and she made this class enjoyable AND interesting. I received a 95 by working hard and doing my homework and was able to exempt the final. If you do your work and go to class there's no reason you can't get an A. And she truly loves her students.

Easiest professor I've taken for a math course. She explains material so well and is clear on how you're graded and what should be known for exams. Allows a notecard for every exam and quiz. There is homework but it's manageable and has clear due dates.
Galloway is great! She will work hard to make sure you understand the topic. If you struggle in math, she is the professor to take! She also gives you a notecard cheat sheet for every quiz and test.

Professor Galloway is the best professor I have had. She does everything in her power to ensure that you succeed. Do the homework and print the notes throughout the semester and you will do great. If you can, take professor Galloway!!

She's truly a gem. I absolutely loved her class, her teaching notes were so helpful when it came down to studying for her quizzes and test. She was always accessible inside and outside of class. If you take her class, make sure you do the homework! Also, if you want an A in the class, you MUST put in the work! If you have questions ASK THEM!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Lecture heavy

comment: One of the best teachers Ive ever had. You can tell she genuinely cares and will go out of her way to make sure you understand the content. She replies to emails fast and teaches whats on the test and the test is exactly like the hw. Just, an amazing teacher overall. So so sweet. If you can, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND PROF GALLOWAY!!!!
Great Teacher! Take her if you want to succeed. She is really great at helping students understand the material. But I dont really need to give her much praise, her score on here speaks for its self!

I'm not the biggest math person but she made the class understandable. Don't skip class as material is crucial and if you miss 2 or less classes she will give you a point added to your final grade. Get a 95 or above in class and you exempt the final. make sure to do your HW on webassign as it's worth 10% (a whole letter grade)
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I've never considered myself to be good at math but the way she teaches makes me actually understand what I'm doing. Best math teacher I've had since middle school.

There were more students than seats in the room but she acknowledged the work I put in. I would gladly take her again. Just show up to class with the daily notes printed and ready to be filled in, calculator ready and DO THE HW. If not for a grade than for your own benefit. I did the HW the night before the test so it was fresh for the test.

I always struggled with math, but Professor Galloway made STAT so simple. I definitely recommend going to every class so you do not fall behind, but attendance is not mandatory. She allows a notecard for every test to write down formulas. If you have struggled with math in the past, take Professor Galloway!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Galloway is a great teacher. She makes the content very easy to understand. The tests/quizzes aren't very hard as long as you study. You get to have a notecard on each quiz and test.
She is a teacher passionate about what she does, and cares abut her student's success.
Dr. Galloway is a good teacher because she provides guided notes that cover everything on the test. Her tests cover the material on the guided notes. No surprises!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: AMAZING, I never have had a professor as good as her. She cares and wants you to do good! I couldn't have asked for anyone better. BEST PROFESSOR EVER HANDS DOWN
Dr. Galloway is hands down the best professor at KSU. She knows what she's doing and explains everything very well. She has teaching notes that you fill in and leaves you with great notes! TAKE HER
She is AMAZING. Attendance is required for extra credit. Her notes are THE BEST. She sincerely cares about her students, and loves to call herself your math momma

Professor Galloway really helps her students understand the concepts that she teaches and expects you to know. If you try you will pass her class. She allowed us to use note cards on exams which helped a lot. At the end of the semester she will give you multiple opportunities to bring up your average. She's wants her students to succeed.

She is awesome! I was very nervous to take math because I always did so bad in high school, but her class was different. I never got below a B in her class. If you have a 95 or over at the end of the semester you don't have to take the final. The final is cumulative, which sucks but it;s not bad. I would take her every math class if i could.

I took Dr. Galloway my freshman year. She made this class as easy as high school math. I will be taking her for STAT1107. Amazing teacher, she helps so much with understanding. She had online homework that was worth like 10% BUT she could have done away with that by now.

Dr. Galloway is the best! Although attendance isnt mandatory, an extra point is offered if you miss two or less class periods and lectures are essential to knowing whats going on (specifically because its a math class). You can tell she loves teaching, and is so helpful if youre lost or confused. Definitely made math less daunting. :)
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Amazing professor! I took her twice. She explains concepts very well! Highly recommend. This is not about getting an easy A. This is about learning!

I am not a math person at ALL, but I needed this class to meet the general requirements. She goes into depth but keeps the material clear and simple so everyone can understand. I never got nervous before a test because she lets you take an index card in with you, and posts test preps and worksheets. Connect Math also gives good examples for the hw
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Prof. Galloway is INCREDIBLE. She is the best math professor I have ever had. TAKE HER. Attendance is required, but all of her classes are totally worth your time and she makes sure that you understand all the material. She even sent me an email when I left a question blank by accident so that I could run back and fix it. She is AWESOME.

One of the best math teachers I have ever had!! She is great at teaching and tries teaching many different ways until you understand. Online math homework for a grade (keep up). No multiple choice test or quizzes, have to put a answer. CAN HAVE A NOTE CARD ON ALL TESTS AND QUIZZES. Extra points at the end if you have a certain amount of absences.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. Galloway is the sweetest lady ever. She is always willing to work with you and super accessible outside of class. Her notes are worksheets you follow in class, and reflect the test so it's important to show, and you get a point if you have good attendance. Her quizzes and tests are straightforward and she gives you study guides.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Sometimes she can be confusing, but the course overall wasn't too difficult, she's always available to help.
She doesn't take attendance as a grade but if you have 2 or less missed days then you can get some extra points. She is probably the best math teacher I have ever had.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Professor Galloway is the best math professor I have ever had. Instead of making the class memorize formulas, she allows a notecard with formulas for every quiz/test. This makes it much easier to comprehend the material and its practical use, rather than using all brain power to try and recall tedious formulas. I love Stat because of her class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: she's nice/okay teacher for the most part, but makes you feel stupid if you don't understand a concept, so i'd feel uncomfortable asking questions. the teaching notes make it easier to follow along, so print them out - helpful in the long run & faster when taking notes in class. extra pts for attendance at end semester if you miss 2/less classes.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Galloway is amazing. You will not regret taking her. She really helps walk you through every step to help you understand the concepts. I would definitely recommend taking her.

Great Stats professor! Absolutely take her. She is one of my favorite professors at KSU. Attendance is necessary and beneficial. Many students in the class have taken her before and that speaks volumes.

Professor Galloway is a great math teacher. Her class isnt difficult to begin with, and even if you struggle with math shes more than willing to help you until you understand the concepts. She doesnt make you get a textbook, and the homework is minimal. If youre just taking math to get the credit out of the way, this is the class for you.

Y'all she's awesome!! TAKE HER! She explains things so well & tells you exactly what you need to know for tests/quizzes. Barely any hw, it's online & easy. Don't need book, just access code for WebAssign. She lets you use a notecard for every test/quiz & go to her reviews bc she gives you extra practice probs that are similar to her tests! Love her
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: For starters, I was always horrible at math and was terrified upon signing up as I thought college math would be the end of me. I was wrong. Dr. Galloway took everything step by step and explained every detail. She is the reason why I got my first A in math in 5 years. She made sure every student understood everything. I highly recommend her!

She is the best! I had her my first semester and she was great, I wish I could have her again. I am terrible at math but she is willing to work with you and made math super easy for me. She did give us online homework, but it was not that much and was helpful to the class. The test were also super easy and overall a great class.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures--Would take again

comment: She gives you 2 quizzes and 1 test over every chapter. There's homework online for every chapter. The homework isn't bad because you can try a problem multiple times until you get it right and her tests aren't bad as long as you've paid attention in class. She tells you exactly whats going to be on the test so you can study well. Would take again.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: Dr. Galloway makes her expectations very clear. She allows you to use note cards on the tests and makes practice tests. As long as you make use of your calculator and do the homework you'll be fine.

Dr. Galloway would have been an easy A, if I had taken her class seriously from the start. I somehow managed a B. You will always know exactly what's on the test and she is always available to meet with you and help. Does not like taking questions during lectures, have to see her after. A lot of homework that does not really reflect test material.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Tests are tough

comment: She taught my class while she was in school for her masters, she was a wonderful teacher who really cares about her students doing well. I'm not a huge math fan, but she really does such a great job making sure you all succeed. TAKE HER FOR STAT.
Loved her! She makes math super simple.

I had a student teacher, and she is amazing. She does a great job explaining the work. Plenty of grades, so a lot of opportunities to increase your grade in the class. I would definitely recommend her.

Professor Galloway is an AMAZING professor. She's clear and concise when teaching and helps her students to actually understand the topics she's teaching. Hands down one of the best math teachers I've ever had.

Professor Galloway is a great math teacher. This is her first time teaching math1101, but she did a great job. She puts teaching notes on D2L before each class, so you can follow along. She isn't a very tough grader. Easy A.

Take her if you can! I am awful at math I took the same stat class this summer and failed it and then took her and got an A. She wants you to pass and will do everything she can to help, she is so clear with her lectures and gives a clear guide what will be on tests and quizzes. I have never had a professor who cares about success as much as her
Dr. Galloway is amazing! She makes class very clear and wants her students to succeed. If you have the chance to take her, please do!

Hands down - best professor I've ever had. She really takes the time to make sure you understand and she genuinely wants you to do well! No need for the book really, unless you want extra practice but I just did the WebAssign problems and was fine.

Dr. Galloway is the first math class I will ever recieve an A in. You can't just show up and pass, though. But if you put the work in, do the webassign assignments, it's pretty much a guaranteed A. First test and second test I got a 100%, it was her first time teaching Math 1101 and she did amazing. Definitely take her if you can, it's worth it.
She is amazing. Post guided notes that really help you follow along as she lectures.

Professor Galloway is amazing! If you have the opportunity to take her, do it. She is very understanding and grades fairly (even gives bonus points sometimes). 5 or so units with a quiz and test for each plus the final. Online homework which is super easy if you pay attention. Gives lecture "fill in" notes on D2L to help during class. The best!!!!

I failed math 3 semesters in a row (I wish I was kidding). Few weeks in her class, I have straight A's. By far the best math teacher I've had in my life. Always available after class and by appointment. Always ready to help. Will make time for her students if the students make the effort to see her. Will probably take her for Stats next semester.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: I have had Dr. Galloway for College Algebra and Trig and I am so thankful I took her for both. She is an amazing teacher with a unique teaching style. Its online homework and work at your own pace. You do need to go to class because sometimes she will go over things students are having trouble with. Highly recommend

Dr. Galloway is the best teacher I've had at Kennesaw. Math isn't my strongest subject but I actually enjoyed this class. Dr. Galloway goes above and beyond to make sure that you understand the material and can get a good grade. She's willing to meet outside of class, she posts detailed notes and videos, she genuinely cares about you and your grade

Professor Galloway is one of the tougher math teachers I've had, but she is completely fair. She is willing to listen if you don't think you got the grade you deserved. Expect about 2-4 homework assignments online each week, but they don't take much to finish. Gives plenty of tough quizzes and 5 tests, including the (cumulative) final exam.

Mrs. Galloway was the best math teacher I have had in college. I took her Stats class and i loved it. She made 8 AM enjoyable. i was always excited to go to class and learn. you have guided notes that you fill in and use them for the test. Easy A.

I love Galloway! I never made anything under a 92 in her class. The material in this class is so easy to understand and she had MANY teaching assistants to help us! She does a wonderful job at teaching material and allows us to have a note card full of information for every exam and quiz! Her class average is high, I recommend!

I am terrible at Math, but I think she is a good teacher. Everybody in my class seemed to like her teaching style. She was always there to help, It is just my fault I did not do good, not her. I would recommend her based on the performance of other students. Most of the class always get her,  except me. I guess i am just terrible at math.

Dr. Galloway is the best math teacher I have ever had.  Attend her class daily, do all the assignments and practice what she gives you, and you will make an A.  Even if you are not a math person, she makes everything so much easier to understand.  And her grading is not that bad either and is always willing to work with her students.  Outstanding!!

Im terrible at math and I still managed to get an A. She says you should print out the notes for each day and you absolutely should as they really help you understand the material. If you study and do the work you will be just fine.

Dr. Galloway is amazing. She's there to help if you need it. She puts the notes online, so all you have to do is print them out, bring them to class, and fill them out during class. There's online homework, 3 tests, and a final. She let's you have a note card for each quiz and test.

I took Dr. Galloway for Math 1107 and loved her. Math isn't my strong subject, but she explains topics in a way that makes sense and works hard to make sure that her students understand! She's very caring, and will work with you if you have to miss class! Gives extra points for attendance, and has note handouts that really help-would take again!

TAKE HER! One of the sweetest professors I have ever met. She teaches in more of a high school fashion, which is fine because it's math. She goes the extra mile to make sure ALL of her students are getting the help they need. Use her print out notes, pay attention, & you will pass. Attendance isn't required, but it's smart to attend regularly.

Print out the teaching notes(makes studying easier),  pay attention in her class, ask questions,do mymathlab, and fill out your notecard, and you should do well. I have never been good at math, but with her teaching method and staying for her review sessions, where she practically tells you what is going to be on the test, I got an A.

Statistics is a hard class and it is taught differently than it was the past year.  Don't look at the other reviews as this class has changed,so beware. Youhave pop quizzes and the tests are super hard even with a note card.  You must get extra help with TA or you WILL NOT pass.

Dr. Galloway is a great statistics professor! She posts pre-made "fill in the blank" notes for each lecture on D2L and lets you take a note card on each exam (and for my class, a whole sheet of paper for the final). You will have to work for a good grade, though, it's not an easy A.

Tons of homework and tests are extremely tough.  I got an A in precalculus, but am struggling in statistics. Her tests are tricky and lots of concepts were not covered that you have to do on your own.  Very frustrated

Her lectures are very clear. She gives out note outlines that you can fill in during lectures. There is nothing on tests or quizzes that isn't explained fully in the notes. Is very helpful during office hours too. As long as you pay attention and do the practice problems in class, you are sure to do well.

Dr Galloway makes it crystal clear the first day of class that you earn your grade. She is an incredicle teacher and will do anything she can to help you succeed. i really enjoyed stat!!  Go to class to fill in the blanks of her teaching notes and do provided practice on your own and youre set. Notecard on every test. Dr Galloway is awesome!!

Dr. Galloway is no nonsense, yet she is fair. She is not above using humor to create a positive stress free learning environment. An expert in her field, Dr. Galloway is always available and attentive to all her students. She is one of my favorite professors and I'd take any course she taught. She expects you to do the work, you'll be glad you did

I LOVE DR. GALLOWAY! She is so patient and is very clear when teaching. I wouldn't describe her as "nice" because she doesn't smile very much and she's very stern but she DOES have a sense of humor! I would email her at 10pm and she almost always responded. I honestly couldn't have asked for a better teacher. Statistics was HARD but she made it ok.

Took her summer session and loved it! Ofcourse the class moves at a faster pace but its definitely manageable! The only way you'll succeed is if you practice on your own and study- what a shocker. I love Dr Galloway and her teaching style! She's very generous as she lets you use cheat sheet notecards on every test. Best math class i've ever taken
Statisticsn is a really hard class.  The teacher goes fast and is not clear.  She gives tons of homework and her tests are unlike her notes.  Very confusing.

Lots of homework and tests are hard.  If you're a math wiz, maybe note.  I really had a hard time with statistics and she had a hard time explaining it.  If you can teach yourself you are ok .  If not, take someone else.  I got a c and went for help sessions.

Loved this class! I've never liked math but this class is pretty darn easy. You DO have to practice a bit, it's not like you can just show up and expect to pass. Can use the front of one note card as a  "cheat sheet" on quizzes and tests, a whole sheet of paper for the final. Galloway is very nice and cares about students doing well!

Her class was an easy A. If you don't like or understand math, take her!! She clearly explains everything. Her tests and quizzes are extremely easy. She also wants you to pass no matter what, so she is willing to help.

Dr. Galloway's statistic class is ridiculously easy, her teaching notes are very helpful, and her quizzestests were clear on what she was asking for. If you're bad at math, this is the professor for you. If you're good at math, you'll find yourself bored in class and wondering why you still attend. Very helpful and easy course.

I am not that good at math but Prof. Galloway was amazing at explaining the material. Also, with the teaching notes she gives you, you can follow along it again at home and it is like being in class again. If you are worried about taking math, take her.

At first there was a lot going on, and it was confusing but if you follow syllabus, do online HW, and pay attention in class you should do very well. You will have to study, but if there is a problem she is there in many ways to help. No book required, there are quizzes, test (she give credit for effort to solve problem correctly), and a project.

This class was very hard. There is no multiple choice, you have to know how to solve the problems, and there is a project, plus she dropped the lowest grade. Great teacher, but the class was too hard and confusing for me.

She is a very helpful teacher, but her tests are not multiple choice. You need to make sure you understand how to solve the problems. I took this class, it was very hard for me. You will have to work hard if you want to pass.

Take her, hands down best math teacher I've ever had. She makes a point to tell her class she isn't a miracle worker but as long as you go to class and put forth effort, it can be an easy a. And without a doubt the easiest math class you'll ever take. She is so helpful and wants everyone to succeed. There is no way you'll regret taking her class!

TAKE THIS CLASS. Best math professor I've ever had. Slow paced, and gives lots of examples and resources to study. She takes the time to explain the concepts. Everything is straight forward and she doesn't try to trick you up on anything. Online homework you can keep trying until you get a 100. TAKE HER

By far the best Statistics professor at KSU. She has a huge waitlist for people that want in her class. Very slow paced- easy learning. Loved the class. Easy homework and quizzes/tests and one simple project. Take her class.

THE best professor I have ever hoped to take at Kennesaw. Absolutely phenomenal, I have NEVER been good at math until I had her. She is just incredible. Will NOT refuse a student the help they need and will go above and beyond to make sure the info is drilled in your head! I have never had such good things to say about a professor. PLEASE take her!

If you are naturally not good with math she is the professor to take. She gives you many chances to do well in her class  including a project,easy homework, and dropping the lowest test grade. TAKE HER!

BEST STAT PROF EVER!!!!!!!! Very nice and helpful! She lectures from notes that are online. Tries to explain in easy steps so that every student can understand the material. Attend class and do hw.  on tests/quizzes, you can use notecard, 1 project=test grade. She wont spoon feed you answers…If you want an A, you must work for it!

I would 100% recommend. Provides notes online that compliment the lectures. Tests and quizzes are very straight forward. As long as you attend class and do the homework, you'll do very well.I HATED AP Stats in high school but because of this class I'm now starting an Applied  Statistics minor.

Math has never been easy for me and I dread every class relating to math BUT this professor is amazing. She has a way of explaining things that even a math dummy like myself can understand. Take her..she is so sweet and really cares about her students actually getting the work. You can tell she loves her job!

Class is easy especially if you come to class and take notes. The notes are put online and she's very clear as to what needs to be done. 4 part excel project. She has videos online to show exactly what to do. No one should make less than a B if you put forth some effort

Dr. Galloway is an amazing professor. She breaks down the material to a managable level to make sure everyone understands. She works extra hard and and really cares so much. There are a lot of quizes and tests but this makes sure that you fully understand the concept before you move to the next. She is definately the teacher to have for Stats!!!

Dr. Galloway is an excellent professor. She goes above and beyond to help you understand the material. I am terrible at math and I did very well in this class. The key is doing the worksheets that she provides. They are not mandatory, but they are extremely helpful. I highly recommend Dr. Galloway.

SHE IS AMAZNG!!!!! I am absolutely horrible at math. Hate math with a passion- but this professor has made math and learning so EASY!!!! There are A LOT of opportunities to raise your grade and she really does want everyone to succeed! She's super sweet and fun- I was never bored! I definitely recommend taking her if you can!

She is a wonderful teacher. She does everything step by step and helps you through it. She also gives you guided notes for every class which is very helpful. You have to do a project which wasn't my favorite but she helps every step of the way. I highly suggest taking her!!

TAKE HER! She went out of her way to make sure everyone understood the material. Extremely helpful if you need the extra help. There is absolutely no way you can fail this class, unless you decide not to come and do your work.

She was AMAZING!!! I have never received an A in math but I got one in this Stats class. I loved her seriously she was amazing!! Just do the worksheets she gives you and make sure you go to class with the notes printed. She gives you every way to pass the class if you do badly it is your own fault. If your bad at math TAKE HER!!!

I honestly suck at math and got an A in this class. She is the best professor I've ever had. She really wants you to do well and she will go out of her way to help you if you just ask. I never used my text book or the online help, but attendance will do wonders for your grade because she explains everything so well. Cannot stress how good she is.

LOVE Dr. Galloway! She is so sweet and strives to help her students! Best math teacher I have ever had - if you get a chance to take a class with her, do it! Hmwk is only on MML and you do not need to buy the textbook. She teaches off of notes and lets you bring a notecard in on test days.

Prof. Galloway is an extremely helpful and intelligent professor. She always makes sure to help her students in any way she can, and has note sheets you can print out. USE THE NOTE SHEETS AND DO THE MY MATH LAB HOMEWORK. IT'S REALLY IMPORTANT!!

Dr. Galloway is an amazing professor!  She is great at what she does. She is always willing to answer people's questions and will stay after class to answer any questions you have. and she has a sense of humor! Take her!

She really wants everyone to succeed!! She is really into stats. She will GIVE you EVERYTHING you need to get an A. Just go to class and the Worksheets she posts on GAVIEW!! TAKE HER YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!

Galloway is extremely helpful. She really wants to see her students succeed. If you work hard you can easily make an A. I went to the SI sessions for the class and that helped a ton. I didn't buy the book and I didn't do StatsPortal and still made an A

AWESOME prof. She has her own teaching notes, which are EXACTLY like her exams! She wants EVERYONE to pass and I never liked math. I thought I would never say that I enjoy STATS, but she made it so fun & relaxed atmosphere! Worth the time and money spent!

Prof. Galloway is the best math professor I've had at KSU.  She is very helpful and allows cheat sheets on quizzes and tests.  The course can get a litle tricky at times; however, she is willing to meet with students outside of class time to help you if you ask.  Awesome professor!!!

She breaks things down step by step and goes beyond that to ensure you understand the material.  She will come in on her personal time to help you.  She is just incredible!  It is impossible to fail this class unless you absolutely do not try. It can get difficult at times but she is ALWAYS willing to help...always.

Her class is very simple.. follow along notes with powerpoints, homework, tests. The homework could be difficult, but the tests are the easier questions. She uses my math lab, which helps out a lot. If I ever had a question/issue she always helped me out.
Dr.Galloway is a great teacher. She is very helpful, before class she puts up a worksheet that you'll use during class to take notes. Tests and quizes are faily easy.
Absolutely wonderful. Math isnt really my thing but i got a high A in her class. Class with her is very enjoyable and i wish she were teaching other courses cause i would take her with them too!

She puts SO much effort into the class and will spend all the time you need to help you understand. She makes printout notes available online which makes the material incredibly easier to understand. Also lets you use a calculator for nearly everything. TAKE HER.

Professor Galloway was my favorite professor throughout my college experience yet. She an absolutely amazing teacher. Its not an easy A and she does make each student work for their grade but she is really awseome about helping students really learn and achieve the grade they want. She's always available during outside class too. Loved her.
AMAZING WONDERFUL TEACHER! i am HORRIBLE at math. SHE made everything very comprehensible. helps A TON! shes very helpful and gives LOTS of material that helps you SO MUCH!

This woman is AMAZING!!! Best math teacher I have ever had!! She make sure everyone understands the material and is there for extra help. I was really worried when I first signed up for this class but she made it a no stress math class. I would recommend her to everyone. She is an awsome teacher!!

Dr. Galloway,a motivating and easy to follow professor who takes interest in success of her students. Gives great notes, always there for extra help. Tests are well prepared for with class quizes and practice probs.  She drops the lowest quiz grade and is generous with time available for the class project. A+ professor for Statistics.
